oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Long-term Non-invasive Ventilation Therapies in Children: A Scoping Review
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Castro Codesal, Maria
Featherstone, Robin
Martinez Carrasco, Carmen
Katz, Sherri
DeHaan, Kristie
Chan, Elaine
Bendiak, Glenda

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of this scoping review is to provide an overview of the evidence for the use of long-term non-invasive ventilation (NIV) in children.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
